code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./form.css';import Leaderboard from'./leaderboard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTeamForm=()=>{const[teamName,setTeamName]=useState('');const[timing,setTiming]=useState('');const[missingLaps,setMissingLaps]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.post('http://kggeniuslabs.com:4000/add-team',{team_name:teamName,timing:parseFloat(timing),missing_laps:parseInt(missingLaps,10)}).then(response=>{alert(response.data);window.location.reload();}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LoginApp ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-card mx-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"logintxt text-center ",children:"Add Score"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:teamName,onChange:e=>setTeamName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Team Name",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:timing,onChange:e=>setTiming(e.target.value),placeholder:"Timing",step:"0.01",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:missingLaps,onChange:e=>setMissingLaps(e.target.value),placeholder:"Missing Laps",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"rounded-3",children:"Add Timing"})})]})]})})})});};export default AddTeamForm;
